storyInfo: Federico and Arturia each speak with the long-lost Yulia, gradually unveiling the mysteries of Kargereich.

attributes.content: I'm going out. Would you like to come with?
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: ...Alright.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Give me a moment.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Drei, zwei, eins...
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: Frau Seemann, guten abend!
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: The window facing the street opens in response, and a woman with a furrowed brow holds a paintbrush, gazing into the distance. The young girl waves to her, smiling as bright as the marigolds lining the alley.
Frau Seemann takes a break and opens her window every day right at this time. She paints all morning, then looks into the distance, listens to music, relaxes, and looks for inspiration.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: That's odd, looks like she's in a bad mood today. She closed the window without waving back. Maybe she's having trouble with her art. I should go see her with Mutti tonight.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: You know the neighborhood well, Vivian.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: You mean Karl Schmidt Street? Of course I do. I've been here all ten years of my life!
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: Did your parents always live here?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: They were away for brief stints a few times, I'm not sure why... But they always came back.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: When you compare it to the rest of Zwillingstürme, Karl Schmidt isn't anything special. We've got a few flower shops, a bar, paint stores, and some stout buildings. We don't even have a spire.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: The people here are ordinary, plus a few struggling artists and nobles... but my parents really like it here.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: Have they ever had any trouble?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Vati mentioned some trouble before. But he's been prepared for anything since he decided to stay.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: Did Werner von Hochberg find a way to become common?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Vati's not so common! He may only teach literature at the commoners' school in Wein, but the big kids there respect him a lot.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: I see...
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: He probably used all his connections in Sturmland and Zwillingstürme, spent all his savings, maybe even changed his appearance...
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: It's no small thing to give up everything one has.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: By the way, Vivian, is that a cake you're holding?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Ja, the lady next door taught me. The marigold's stamen has a bitterness to it, but when ground into powder and pinched into a cake, its fragrance helps balance the sweetness.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: Mutti found a job in Bachshof, earning a bit more than before. She's working as an editor for her favorite poetry journal! She gets home very late though...
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: So I said I'd bring her lunch for a whole month.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: Isn't that exhausting?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Mmmm... you smell that?
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: When the breeze picks up, the fragrance of the coffee shop up ahead wafts on over.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: I help with as much as I can so Mutti and Vati won't be so tired. At least enough that they can take me to Frau Seemann's gatherings on the weekends.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: They hold my hands as we walk down the long alley to her house. There are so many interesting people there. They play the piano so well, and speak so eloquently.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: I like it here. I don't think it's exhausting.
attributes.name: Vivian

attributes.content: ...I'm glad of that.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.text: This is a wonderful life too.

attributes.content: What's this? Wasn't that... Lucinda?
attributes.name: Onlooking Passerby A

attributes.content: How could such a well-behaved commoner have offended anyone? Did she write something she shouldn't have? Why did the authorities come so quickly? Is there any explanation?
attributes.name: Onlooking Passerby A

attributes.content: They were gone as quick as they came, what else can we say? (Whispering) Be careful what you ask. It probably has something to do with her husband.
attributes.name: Onlooking Passerby B

attributes.content: Werner?
attributes.name: Onlooking Passerby A

attributes.content: I've heard he's actually the heir to the Kurfürst of Sturmland, living incognito with his wife and daughter on Karl Schmidt Street for the past decade.
attributes.name: Onlooking Passerby B

attributes.content: I've gotten along with them so well all these years, I'd never have guessed. He's hidden himself so well...
attributes.name: Onlooking Passerby A

attributes.content: Oh, how could that be!
attributes.name: Onlooking Passerby B

attributes.content: Rumor has it Werner didn't show up to class this morning. Who knows if he was taken away by a Hochberg vassal or the Empresses' Voice?
attributes.name: Onlooking Passerby B

attributes.content: Odds are it was Frieda Seemann who gave him up. That woman's out of her mind.
attributes.name: Onlooking Passerby B

attributes.content: Shhh, keep your voice down.
attributes.name: Onlooking Passerby A

attributes.content: The cake thuds as it falls to the ground.
Viviana hears sobbing. The fragile shoulders before her tremble, like flowers battered by the wind.
She holds the girl's hand tightly.
Vivian... Don't look.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Seniora Yulia Schüler, I perceive only vague silhouettes of the remnants. Could you clearly point out the locations where they may be hidden?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: My patron firearm may be of use. I will guarantee your safety.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Um...
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Herr Executor, you may have misunderstood.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Those men aren't here to do anything to me.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: When I first saw the masked people, I would keep my distance and hide, but I later found they weren't concerned with me at all.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Their appearance in any particular part of 'Zwillingstürme' usually means there's a new threat... they're more like a 'signal.'
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: 'Threat'?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Not a true threat, I... I don't know how to explain it.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: It's like... a natural disaster beyond human comprehension, abnormally bad weather, or a waking nightmare...
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: The atmosphere in 'Zwillingstürme' has taken a turn for the worse, especially recently. The clouds are heavy, and even the sunset looks faded. I'm always hearing loud, thundering noises.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Several times, I awoke to find a whole chunk of 'Zwillingstürme' completely empty.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: So many prominent buildings seemingly dug away by something, leaving only an empty space where they once were. Like a whole section of history had been erased.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: The threats erase the spires of different eras without a trace, gradually consuming all of 'Zwillingstürme.'
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: And sooner or later, the small alley I live in will be next.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: So you jumped out to prevent me from using my patron firearm.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You've been protecting this place.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Ja. I've never seen you before.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: I've had a powerful premonition this time.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: A premonition.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Such feelings are usually nothing more than psychological indicators. Without backing in logic, it is difficult to take action upon them.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: But the Witch King's remains have indeed appeared...
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Herr Executor, when you live in a place for five or ten years, when you become a part of it, you develop senses like a fowlbeast, and can smell the storm before it comes.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: You would aid the 'Echoes of Herkunftshorn'?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: No, this is my own thing. Even if they didn't appear today, I'd find a way myself.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: But how will you fight against those disasters, the weather, or the waking nightmares?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: With those Arts devices you're carrying...?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: The truth is, I've been going to different places at around this time each day. Especially to those blanks and the edges where buildings have vanished.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: That's dangerous...
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: But I collected enough devices from those places.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: They seem to be some sort of echo device that collects Arts information.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Frau Giallo, if the masked men truly are the Echoes of Herkunftshorn, then these echo devices must be what the Witch King used to deal with his enemies.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: They'll surely come in handy!
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Are you... going to renovate the street yourself?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Marigold Alley is on the outskirts of Bodenshof, very inconspicuous. No one comes here deliberately, except some tourists, painters, and wandering poets.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Even all of Bodenshof, taken against the twenty-two districts of Zwillingstürme, isn't all that special.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: And in this Zwillingstürme, with its many storied historical spires... maybe no one would even notice such an ordinary alley.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: But it's where I was born and raised... No one knows it better than me.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: I know when it's lively, and when it's quiet.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: I know all its sounds: the singing of wandering troubadours, the humming tunes of pedestrians, the busy footsteps on the cobblestones, the sound of rain against the marigolds and awnings...
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: I know where the resonance pipelines buried beneath the street are still functional, I know which Arts sculptures on the corners can replace the broken parts...
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: And how to connect them all in the most convenient way, and then activate them with these echo devices!
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: But you don't know what the modified resonance pipelines will even do.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: These devices left in those empty areas suggest that—
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Oh, but Frau Giallo, there's something I have to do.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: And I can always do something.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: I told myself as much, when I was very young.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: I said I'd take good care of Jan and myself. And not be like our parents...
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Your parents?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: They passed away a long time ago, I think it was 1077.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Your parents were persecuted during the Twin Empresses' coup?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Nein, they were as common as common could be.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: They were sick at the time, and the tremendous sound of the Witch King's Genesis Spire collapsing in the distance, the tromping of the soldiers outside the house... it all aggravated their illness.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: They always feared that, at any moment, the Gendarmerie would burst in and take us away, or even level the entire block. In turbulent times like that, there is nothing so shocking.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: They died in terror even before Herr Bach could launch his Glorreiches Kapitalprojekt.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: When a terrible clamor drowns out everything else, we hear only the voices within ourselves. We find our fears and worries magnified.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Yulia, forgive me for not being able to better comfort you.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: That's alright. I just wanted to say that I can't let myself lose the courage to live as I have been.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Maybe you still don't see our surroundings clearly... We've walked all the way from the gallery at the end of the street down to the cafe where I've spent almost a decade.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: I started working there just to make ends meet. The owner was kind, letting me and Jan live in the shed behind the courtyard.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: I turned it into a proper home, and even set up a little space for Jan to practice his Arts.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: The boy is gifted, you know. We saw casters using Arts to repair sculptures on the street, and he watched for only a few moments before going home and spending the whole night turning his room into a 'sound-control' space.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: I've talked about it with Loris, and we'll send him to study Arts at Ludwigs-Universität.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Loris intends to make a career in Zwillingstürme, and once he does, he'll give Jan a recommendation.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Later, when this cafe was about to close down, I used all my savings to buy it for myself.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: I became the owner, the waitress, and even worked on making my own special blend of coffee for its grand reopening...
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Danger is unpredictable, but life is tangible.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: You only want to protect it.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: From the piano studio on the corner to here, there are a total of eight resonance pipelines, and these echo devices happen to fit the interfaces on them.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: I told you they'd be useful!
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: That is logical.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Bach tuned all of Zwillingstürme's resonance pipelines during his Glorreiches Kapitalprojekt, in order to adjust the Arts arrays laid throughout the city during the reign of the Witch King.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: We're just a few steps from my cafe now. The reconstruction project for this half is almost done.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Are they showing up again?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Ja. Right around the corner from the cafe.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: I guess I'll need to work faster.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: This feels... familiar.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Similar to a certain day, exactly the same even...
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: It was the day I first opened the cafe. I stood by the door waiting for Loris and Jan... They were a little late.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: I knew the two of them wanted to do something special for the grand opening. They were a little too obvious about it.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Loris went to order flowers in another part of the city, and specifically asked me to wait for him in the most conspicuous part of the block...
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: He didn't even realize he'd left the order on the table when he came by to help the day before.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Meanwhile, Jan had snuck into Frau Seemann's house a few times the week before... Nearly all the kids of Marigold Alley have asked her to paint them a souvenir still life at one point or another.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: I let them go anyway. The beginning of a new life... I promised Loris as much too.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: The wind was strong that morning. Enough to make you feel dazed. There weren't many people out on the street.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: But I think I noticed two standing in the corner opposite the cafe...
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: They had black masks... with twisted patterns on them...
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: They noticed me too. They walked over.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: The Witch King's remains... That explains why you perceive the patterns in the Genesis Horn as manifesting a concrete form.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: This was your only connection to the Witch King during your lifetime.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Loris's speculation differed wildly from the truth. You just happened to be at the scene while the Witch King's remains were taking action...
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The city council had no intent to protect a nobleman. As one involved in taking action against the remains, one can imagine Freiherr Fynn's ultimate fate.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: But early in the reign of the Twin Empresses, Zwillingstürme needed to disassociate the entire case from the Witch King and his remains.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: They halted the investigation, concealed the truth of the matter, and hastily closed the case. That was the most efficient approach.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Um, what do you mean?
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Yulia Schüler, your death was entirely coincidental.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I have uncovered the truth of the case. If recalling these details is a burden to you, please refrain from doing so.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Nein, Herr Executor, I only worry that this street may disappear from 'Zwillingstürme' at some point. Just like the long-gone spires...
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: And that I'll never have the chance to keep my promise to Loris.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Logically speaking, you have already—
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Herr Executor, have you ever made any unfulfilled promises?
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Since accepting my commission with the Notarial Hall, there have been two instances where the decedent's will was too ambiguous to be enforceable, and two instances where the target was inadvertently destroyed in an explosion. No other circumstances.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Oh, I don't mean at work.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: A... 'promise.'
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Fede... What are you doing?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Drawing.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: In the dark?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: It is not difficult.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I am busying myself... You said you needed quiet.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Gratias.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: What are you drawing?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Laterano. By night.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Why would you want to draw Laterano by night?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Because the room is dark.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Soror, the nasal tone of your voice has grown lighter. You've stopped crying.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You said you would gradually master your playing. I believe in you. Everyone says you have a talent for music. In general, talent should not bring pain.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I will master it, Fede... I have to.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Are you going to finish your drawing? You seem to be having trouble.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I've completed the overall outline. Now I need to refine the details. But... When night falls on Laterano, where is the first place to light up?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: ...I don't know.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: How about you wait for me to master my method and play my first piece. It won't take long. Then I can take you to the highest point in Laterano to see for yourself.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: That would answer your question, wouldn't it?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: To me, a 'promise' is a form of contract.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: When I made that contract, my cognitive abilities were not yet fully developed, and I was unclear of the obstacles she faced. As well as the painful meaning behind overcoming those obstacles.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: An undefined chaos. She herself was the first 'victim' of her music.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Therefore, understanding the full extent of her changes and preventing her from continuing to spread chaos is the responsibility I must fulfill.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Herr Executor, is that why you've come to 'Zwillingstürme' too?
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Is the person you're talking about also a Sankta?
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Arturia, female, 168 centimeters tall, straight black hair, a mole below her left eye, carries a custom-made cello.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: She arrived here before I did. Have you seen her?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Frau Giallo, you may not want to follow me any further.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Why not?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: You just said that from the gallery at the end of the street to here, with your cafe just ahead, all the resonance pipelines here will soon be restored.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: What is it... you're keeping me from?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: I believe he's the one who hurt you. He's a Sankta as well, yes, but he seems difficult to talk to.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Federico? So he's here too.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: I appreciate your concern. But if it was my little brother who hurt me, you'd have found a few more bullet holes.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: So you're siblings? That's hard to imagine...
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Federico will definitely catch up to me.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: The discovery of gaps along the path one's been following inevitably causes confusion. But for him, that confusion isn't a ripple, it's a crack in the ice.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Neither of us can stop until we find answers.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Alright then.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Phew... This is the last bit... The piano studio on the corner, the gallery at the end of the street... The beginning and the end, all the resonance pipelines converge here.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Yulia...
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: I know what you want to say. This might not have any effect at all... And if so, I'll think of another way.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: I can't let myself just hide away in my home, waiting for the storm to pass.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: The echo devices are all in place. Now it's time to activate the resonance pipelines.
attributes.name: Yulia

attributes.content: Without direction, without daylight, everything is covered in shadow. The Genesis Horn seems to be forever shrouded in mist.
But Arturia perceives the illumination of the pipelines, like a flame in the dark.

Rolling out from the two of them, from near to far, the surrounding scenery gradually becomes clear. She sees everything as clearly as in Yulia's eyes: a street lined with marigolds, countless peculiar spires...
The place is not chaotic. It is one that exists beyond time and space, a grand construct.
At the same time, music flows into her ears.
It is the music of all Marigold Alley, and also, a part of a grander movement. A composition that belongs to Herkunftshorn.
Yulia, my cello is silent, but I've heard your innermost thoughts... they're touching.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Allow me to express my gratitude.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Arturia bows to the Caprinae before her.
So, the most common soul and the most powerful are both written on the same sheet of music.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: The eerie winged sculptures prostrate on both sides of Arturia, supporting towering stone pillars at angles defying mechanical explanation... No, the pillars are suspended in midair.
A palace, solemn and majestic, befits a king.
At the end of the steps, a man stands motionless with his throne. Red curtains sway and cast layers of light on him, veiling the monarch's countenance.
But the infamous twisted horns belie his name.
I've seen you in so many fragments of history and legend. I've crossed paths with you in the memories of so many, including the Liches.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: But it wasn't until I saw Yulia still 'alive' that I caught the faint sense that this journey could really lead to a meeting with the man himself!
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Allow me to introduce myself: Arturia Giallo.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Salutations, Otto Dietmar Gustav von Urtica, Herkunftshorn... Your Majesty the Witch King.
attributes.name: Arturia
